title: Its 10:46pm here in my country and 1h 14mins left before Nov. 30. Cant wait for the new lore stories
body:
Like the title. I'am excited to read the new lore stories for old champs as some rioters claimed that we will receive a new lore update at this particular day(nov 30). Well usually, we receive new updates between 12-6 in the morning, so i'm gonna wait for it now cause i'm so exited. Specially for Varus.

If there are any rioters passing by, can you please tell me the hour of the new lore story's reveal time. Thanks and godbless

replies.body: You're clearly not in NA if it is 10:46PM where you are, or was 13min ago. It's currently 10:01AM, November 29th, here on the East Coast of the US, the same coast that Riot Games is based out of. Considering Riot is who releases new content, you've got a little less than 24 hours to go until it's Nov 30th at around the time stuff usually goes live from Riot.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oNrrfLEL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-29T15:03:21.442+0000)
>
> You're clearly not in NA if it is 10:46PM where you are, or was 13min ago. It's currently 10:01AM, November 29th, here on the East Coast of the US, the same coast that Riot Games is based out of. Considering Riot is who releases new content, you've got a little less than 24 hours to go until it's Nov 30th at around the time stuff usually goes live from Riot.

Actually the largest Riot office is in Los Angeles on the West coast, where it is currently 8:15 AM.
(I don't have an estimate for when anything's releasing though - sorry.)

will it only be varus? to be updated? thanks and hope for a reply 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
no, {{champion:16}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:26}}  and more but i cant remember all of them
thanks for the reply :)
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

But can you say whether or not it will be Varus lore only?

EDIT: Indeed, 5pm GMT or 9 AM California time is the magical hour when Rioters sit at their desks and start torturing poor overhyped souls on the forums. Please never stop.
I for some reason thought you guys were based on the East Coast.

it sucks then lmao. But i think they don't follow NA time anymore as their time basis. Specially, OCE servers tend to be the first ones to use new features that goes live(ex. the honor system) and Singapore & Malaysia was the first one to reveal the pre-season trailer later last month. Nevertheless to say, that if this new lore stories are just riot's tripping or just gonna announce it for their leisure, well you are indeed correct that they'll use NA's time. But then again, thanks for your opinion.
Ya boi is looking forwards with a heavily raised eyebrow silently judging for when these new lores come out and hoping to have his expectations blown to high heaven.

WAIT.
I thought it was just for Varus!
There are _more_ champion stories coming?

_**Oh my.**_

As far I'm aware it is only a story about Varus.
HOWEVER, it should be quite a lot. Like really a lot.
We will see it tomorrow anyway.
Hype
IDK too, but i think some champs will get some though.

I would say the new lore comes around 26 to 28 hours from now.
You do have some time to kill, I guess.
i think its 2-4 hours i guess. because when new stuff comes in the PBE, it usually comes 2-4am here in my country.

As someone who plays the game a few years, I do remember their usual schedule.
It is the 29th November in Germany, Europe and they tend to release new stuff around 5 to 8 pm in my timezone.
It is still a whole day away.

Another German fella.
Hi there. :D

Hi!
Well, League is pretty popular in Germany and I always have the feeling that half of the EUW community ingame is german as well.
As far I'm aware Malicious Metal is also german.
I wouldn't be surprised if there are some others as well.

its 12.40 pm , november 30 here... (11 hours after your initial post) talking to you from the future... the lores arent here yet... we are running out of food, someone poisoned our water supply,too many injured...!

but adjusting to EU/NA schedules from +11GMT is always hard for me!

Never been so excited (and scared) for lore updates. I'm only living in the wait of tomorrow (from where i live, it be tomorrow night).
Just to see what they did to Varus. His client bio update was downright scary. Its just so different. I need to know !
yeah me too and with the looks of it, it will be dec 1 for me to know the new stories and it sucks huhu

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=9jK-NcRmVcw
Which champs will all get new lore btw?

I am mostly interested in Nautilus from what I've seen so far.
some say its just for varus but i think some champs will receive a new story too(excluding their new bio's in the client)

Unless the better lore comes with better teammates, I'm not really interested.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
ehh whutt???
